Articles.Content:
Here is my replica of the historical Sputnik 1 with it's Sputnik carrier rocket.

![z2Mm5ZO.png](http://i.imgur.com/z2Mm5ZO.png)

![PQkP43W.png](http://i.imgur.com/PQkP43W.png)

![CZcyP6p.png](http://i.imgur.com/CZcyP6p.png)

![182QlrQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/182QlrQ.png)

![Tcfrvy1.png](http://i.imgur.com/Tcfrvy1.png)

Notes

To fly it enable RCS and SAS or it will flip.

Download: [http://www./download/8nb9mv992vw8p0a/Sputnik+1.craft](http://www./download/8nb9mv992vw8p0a/Sputnik+1.craft)

Nice work as always, Lime! Repped!

Sorry, I have to spread it around first.
